moves.1. d4: Hi everyone. Just wanna share with you one of my best game in GK. I'm Black in this game.
moves.1... d5: My usual response to this move.
moves.4... Bf5 5. a3 h6 6. g4: Aggressive move. I appreciates. But i dont wanna go back.
moves.7... dxe4: I feel better to open the d rank to develope my pieces and attack my opp. pieces as well.
moves.8. Nd2: Really the bad move of my opp. according to me. See how my opp. pieces are not developed still...
moves.8... Qxd4: Clear the way of d rank with my Queen.
moves.13. Bxf7: I expected. But no use of it at the moment.
moves.14. Bg6 Ne5: How far you Bishop can go...?
moves.16... Nf3+: But no way... I placed my Knight the very best place for my attack with the support of pawn.
moves.18. gxh5 Bc5: The White King is in very dangerous situation that he will die any moment.!
moves.19... Qc6: Protecting my Bishop and attacking his Queen at the same time.
moves.20. Qf1: The only place where safe for his Queen...
moves.20... Nxh5: Started to mobilize my another Knight for my Aggressive attack. The ROYAL FORK at Ng3.
moves.21... Nxf4: Placing my second Knight at the best place for mate soon..
moves.22... Bxe3+: But i didn't bother. I have started my  CONTINUOUS CHECKS for mate...
moves.23. Bxe3: The WORST move by my opponent. He should have take by KING else.
moves.24... Rhg8+ 25. Kxf4 Rdf8#: Very interesting Game for me... i learnt now that how important to start develop the pieces to offense and defense the opponent despite how strong he was...
